DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Changing Travatan Z therapy increase tear film break time subject Xalatan therapy present ocular surface disease .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Ocular Surface Changes After Changing Glaucoma Medications
DOC.detailed_description: Patients take Xalatan monotherapy treat glaucoma present ocular surface disease advise switch medication Travatan Z . Test result record day medication change follow-up determine measurable change tear film break , corneal stain Ocular Surface Disease Index .
DOC.criteria: Xalatan monotherapy 1 18 month 18 year age old diagnose ocular surface disease special population child , pregnant female , prisoner , etc .
